doc.title: Operand

value.content: An operand is the part of an instruction representing the data manipulated by the operator. For example, when you add two numbers, the numbers are the operand and "+" is the operator.

doc.summary: An operand is the part of an instruction representing the data manipulated by the operator. For example, when you add two numbers, the numbers are the operand and "+" is the operator.
